cards.text: Until end of turn, all creatures become black and all lands become Swamps.

cards.flavor: 「万物逝去时都将一笔抹消～爱情变成憎恶，生命变成死亡，光明变成黑暗虚空。」
cards.name: Nihilistic Glee
cards.originalText:
{2}{B}，弃一张牌：目标对手失去1点生命且你获得1点生命。
背水战～{1}，支付2点生命：抓一张牌。 你只可以于你没有手牌时使用此异能。
cards.text:
{2}{B}, Discard a card: Target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Hellbent — {1}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you have no cards in hand.

cards.flavor: 他们把缝线割开，让她啜饮几口酒。 然后他们再把线缝妥，让她继续忙下去。
cards.name: Ragamuffyn
cards.originalText: 背水战～{T}，牺牲一个生物或地：抓一张牌。 你只可以于你没有手牌时使用此异能。
cards.text: Hellbent — {T}, Sacrifice a creature or land: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you have no cards in hand.

cards.flavor: 对贴近地面的鼻子来说，食人魔的逼人体臭闻起来像是高级酸奶干酪。
cards.name: Ratcatcher
cards.originalText:
恐惧
在你的维持开始时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张老鼠牌，展示该牌，并将它置入你手上。 若你如此作，则将你的牌库洗牌。
cards.text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may search your library for a Rat card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

cards.flavor:
「蜥怪的逼视虽然有效，但处理残留物质却很费工夫。 这远比不上将受害者完全分解。」
～札戴克
cards.name: Seal of Doom
cards.originalText: 牺牲末日之缄印：消灭目标非黑色生物。 它不能重生。
cards.text: Sacrifice Seal of Doom: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

cards.flavor: 若有参与者能活着谈论，这场拉铎司聚会便是彻底失败。
cards.name: Slaughterhouse Bouncer
cards.originalText: 背水战～当屠宰场守门者从场上置入坟墓场时，若你没有手牌，则目标生物得-3/-3直到回合结束。
cards.text: Hellbent — When Slaughterhouse Bouncer dies, if you have no cards in hand, target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

cards.name: Slithering Shade

守军（此生物不能攻击。）
{B}：湿滑阴魂得+1/+1直到回合结束。
背水战～只要你没有手牌，则湿滑阴魂能视同不具守军异能地进行攻击。

Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{B}: Slithering Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Hellbent — Slithering Shade can attack as though it didn't have defender as long as you have no cards in hand.

cards.flavor:
「受害者身上有「穿刺手柯托佐」所留的记号. . . 但他多年前就被处死了！」
～沃耶克调查员葛列夫·哈札克

{B}：病态死尸得+1/-1直到回合结束。
{B}，{T}：消灭目标力量小于病态死尸之力量的生物。
cards.text:
{B}: Unliving Psychopath gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature with power less than Unliving Psychopath's power.

cards.flavor:
「大自然的特例教导我们留心例外。 就如兰花能在黑石上生长，法术力的天赋有时也出现在亡者身上。」
～崇始教派德鲁伊布葛
cards.name: Vesper Ghoul
cards.originalText: {T}，支付1点生命：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

cards.flavor:
「有些强烈影像能让你看一眼便永生难忘。 来吧，跟我一同欣赏空无。」
～札戴克
cards.name: Wit's End
cards.originalText: 目标牌手弃掉其手牌。
cards.text: Target player discards his or her hand.

尖笑烈焰对目标生物或牌手造成3点伤害。
背水战～如果你没有手牌，则改为尖笑烈焰对该生物或牌手造成5点伤害。
cards.text:
Cackling Flames deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
Hellbent — Cackling Flames deals 5 damage to that creature or player instead if you have no cards in hand.

cards.name: Demonfire
cards.originalText:
恶魔焰对目标生物或牌手造成X点伤害。 若本回合中曾以此法受到伤害的生物将置入坟墓场，则改为将该生物移出对战。
背水战～如果你没有手牌，则恶魔焰不能被咒语或异能反击，且其伤害不能被防止。
cards.text:
Demonfire deals X damage to target creature or player. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
Hellbent — If you have no cards in hand, Demonfire can't be countered by spells or abilities and the damage can't be prevented.

cards.flavor:
「炎身前锋团在冒火。 敌袭！」
～波洛斯信号兵司瓦
cards.name: Flame-Kin War Scout
cards.originalText: 当另一个生物进场时，牺牲炎身战场斥候。 若你如此作，炎身战场斥候对该生物造成4点伤害。
cards.text: When another creature enters the battlefield, sacrifice Flame-Kin War Scout. If you do, Flame-Kin War Scout deals 4 damage to that creature.

cards.text: As long as Flaring Flame-Kin is enchanted, it gets +2/+2, has trample, and has "{R}: Flaring Flame-Kin gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

cards.flavor: 蚊蚋巷的名号虽不起眼，却是拉尼卡最长的一条街。 其蜿蜒路径如同寄生虫般，穿梭于许多宽阔安全的大道之间。
cards.name: Gnat Alley Creeper
cards.originalText: 蚊蚋巷漫行客不能被具飞行异能的生物阻挡。
cards.text: Gnat Alley Creeper can't be blocked by creatures with flying.

cards.flavor:
「就在遗忘的背后，是片充满各式思绪，让你自己的思绪无可容身的地方。」

cards.name: Ignorant Bliss

cards.text: Exile all cards from your hand face down. At the beginning of the next end step, return those cards to your hand, then draw a card.

cards.flavor: 整装待杀。

杀生装教众每回合若能攻击，则必须攻击。

cards.text:
Kill-Suit Cultist attacks each turn if able.
{B}, Sacrifice Kill-Suit Cultist: The next time damage would be dealt to target creature this turn, destroy that creature instead.

cards.text: Discard a card at random. If you do, Kindle the Carnage deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to each creature. You may repeat this process any number of times.

cards.flavor: 食人魔之间最风行的游戏，就是在把头扭断之前能转上多少圈。
cards.name: Ogre Gatecrasher
cards.originalText: 当破门食人魔进场时，消灭目标具守军异能的生物。
cards.text: When Ogre Gatecrasher enters the battlefield, destroy target creature with defender.

cards.flavor:

目标多色生物获得连击异能直到回合结束。

{R}，牺牲沙暴幻灵：目标生物本回合不能进行阻挡。

cards.text:
{R}, Sacrifice Sandstorm Eidolon: Target creature can't block this turn.

cards.flavor:

恐惧
当尖叫魔鬼进场时，你可以支付{X}。 若你如此作，则目标生物得+X/+0直到回合结束。

cards.text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
When Squealing Devil enters the battlefield, you may pay {X}. If you do, target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.
When Squealing Devil enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {B} was spent to cast it.

敏捷

cards.text:
Haste
Whenever another creature you control dies, it deals damage equal to its power to target player.

cards.originalType: 生物～ — 凡尔西诺／祭师
cards.text: {2}{R}, Discard a card at random: Stormscale Anarch deals 2 damage to target creature or player. If the discarded card was multicolored, Stormscale Anarch deals 4 damage to that creature or player instead.

cards.flavor: 鲜血的味道能将拉铎司门徒仅存的些许自制力击溃。

cards.text:
Enchant creature

cards.originalText:
飞行
坞瓦拉解剖手每回合若能攻击，则必须攻击。
cards.text:
Flying

cards.name: War's Toll
cards.originalText:
每当任一对手横置地以产生法术力时，横置所有由该牌手操控的地。
若由任一对手操控的生物进行攻击，所有由该对手操控的生物若能攻击，则必须攻击。

Whenever an opponent taps a land for mana, tap all lands that player controls.
If a creature an opponent controls attacks, all creatures that opponent controls attack if able.

cards.flavor:

～古鲁公会法师顾拉

cards.text: Weight of Spires deals damage to target creature equal to the number of nonbasic lands that creature's controller controls.

cards.flavor:
「他高兴时会摇尾巴。 他生气时会摇尾巴。 不，在鞭尾蜥蜴身旁不会有好事。
～联盟堂医务室伤兵鲁加

接殖2（此生物进场时上面有两个+1/+1指示物。 每当另一个生物进场时，你可以将此生物上的一个+1/+1指示物移到前者上。）

cards.text:
Graft 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.)
{G}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)

cards.originalText:
接殖4（此生物进场时上面有四个+1/+1指示物。 每当另一个生物进场时，你可以将此生物上的一个+1/+1指示物移到前者上。）
当木身胞塑体进场时，在每个由你操控，且上面有+1/+1指示物的其它生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。
{2}：将一个+1/+1指示物从目标由你操控的生物移到木身胞塑体上。
cards.text:
Graft 4 (This creature enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.)
When Cytoplast Root-Kin enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
{2}: Move a +1/+1 counter from target creature you control onto Cytoplast Root-Kin.

接殖6（此生物进场时上面有六个+1/+1指示物。 每当另一个生物进场时，你可以将此生物上的一个+1/+1指示物移到前者上。）
{G}：目标具有+1/+1指示物的生物获得践踏异能直到回合结束。
cards.text:
Graft 6 (This creature enters the battlefield with six +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.)
{G}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains trample until end of turn.

cards.name: Elemental Resonance
cards.originalText:
永久物结界
在你战斗前的行动阶段开始时，加若干法术力到你的法术力池中，其数量与颜色为受此结界之永久物的法术力费用。 （法术力费用包含颜色。 若某个法术力符号具有数个颜色，则选择其中一个。）
cards.text:
Enchant permanent
At the beginning of your precombat main phase, add mana equal to enchanted permanent's mana cost to your mana pool. (Mana cost includes color. If a mana symbol has multiple colors, choose one.)

cards.name: Fertile Imagination
cards.originalText: 选择一种牌的类别。 目标对手展示其手牌。 每以此法展示出一张该类别的牌，你便将两个1/1绿色腐生物衍生物放置进场。 （牌的类别包括神器、生物、结界、瞬间、地、法术。）
cards.text: Choose a card type. Target opponent reveals his or her hand. Create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens for each card of the chosen type revealed this way. (Artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal are card types.)

cards.flavor:
「此类植株极富韧性，只要有颗尘埃可生根，就能快速成长。」

cards.originalText:

抓一张牌。
cards.text:
Cast Flash Foliage only during combat after blockers are declared.
Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token that's blocking target creature attacking you.
Draw a card.

cards.flavor:
「巨犀兽的吼声破坏力比其足跺还强大。 其震耳巨响带有无法听闻的震动，能让法术器械四分五裂。」

cards.originalText: 当跺吼巨犀兽进场时，消灭目标神器或结界。

Flying
